attributes.action: Introduce 1 day a year to celebrate everyone & everything special about the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Would like the Government to set up one dedicated day every year for everyone to celebrate everyone & everything fantastic about our fantastic NHS family.
#NHSday
attributes.background:
I would like the Government to discuss about having a dedicated day every year to celebrate everyone & everything fantastic about the NHS
#NHSday

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
